wikipedia_page.main: Pauline Jarman (born 15 December 1945), is a Welsh politician. She was the Plaid Cymru National Assembly for Wales Member for South Wales Central from 1999 to 2003 as well as being leader of Rhondda Cynon Taff Council from 1999 - 2004.Educated at Mountain Ash Grammar School, she is a former Cynon Valley Borough Councillor and Mid Glamorgan County Councillor. Currently Rhondda Cynon Taff Council Opposition Leader.  Former Mayor.
